楇字的基本解释

楇
guō
古代盛润滑车轴油膏的器皿。
纺车收丝的器具。

楇
kuǎ
击：“楇戟而坠、应弦而倒者数千万人。”

楇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guō］
［《廣韻》古禾切，平戈，見。］
古代车上盛油膏的容器。
[②]［kuǎ］
［《集韻》苦瓦切，上馬，溪。］
击；横击。

楇字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　楇； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页538第26
【集韻】胡臥切，和去聲。【說文】盛膏器。【字彙】車中盛膏以塗輪者。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?古禾切，音戈。同?。紡車收絲具也。　又【類篇】苦瓦切，誇上聲。橫㰅杖。

楇字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
楇字的起名意思

暂无。

楇
Basic explanation of words
楇
guō
An ancient vessel for lubricating axle grease.
A spinning wheel to take up silk.
楇
kuǎ
Strike: "Tens of millions of people fell with a halberd, and fell in response to the string."
楇
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guō］
["Guangyun" Gu Heqie, Ping Ge, see. ]
A container for oil on an ancient car.
[②]［kuǎ］
["Jiyun" bitter tile cut, mount horse, stream. ]
Hit; cross hit.
楇
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　楇; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 538 Page 26
[Ji Yun] Hu lying and cut, and go to sound. [Said Wen] Ointment container. [Vocabulary] Those who hold cream in the car to coat wheels.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Gu Heqie, Yin Ge. with?. The spinning wheel take-up tool is also.　[Classes] Kuwaqie, boasting sound. Heng 㰅 stick.
